Docs.summary: Represents a collection of elements that are owned by a given or the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The PackageRelationshipCollection class has no public constructor. This class is created and returned by the following methods.
- **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.GetRelationships%2A>
- **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.GetRelationshipsByType%2A>
- **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetRelationships%2A>
- **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetRelationshipsByType%2A>

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1<class System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns an enumerator for iterating through the relationships in the collection.
Docs.returns: An enumerator for iterating through the elements in the collection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The collection accessed by the enumerator is invalidated after any change occurs to the underlying collection. The underlying collection can change when any of the following methods are called.
- **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.CreateRelationship%2A>
- **Package**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.DeleteRelationship%2A>
- **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.CreateRelationship%2A>
- **PackagePart**.<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.DeleteRelationship%2A>
